alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 09 at 2:21PM PST until January 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Calabasas and Agoura Hills. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, from 4 PM Wednesday to noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
